br.com.caelum.vraptor.util.test

Class MockHttpServletResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.caelum.vraptor.util.test.MockHttpServletResponse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, javax.servlet.ServletResponse

    @Component
public class MockHttpServletResponse
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse
    A simple mock for HttpServletResponse. This mock keeps a contentType and a content thereby you could be able to retrieve the content as String.
    Author:
    Vin√≠cius Oliveira
